body_html: Release 0.7.1 wheels now are built assuming cuda-7.5 and cudnn v4. If you want earlier versions supported, you can build from sources and set the appropriate library paths / versions during ./configure.
body_text: Release 0.7.1 wheels now are built assuming cuda-7.5 and cudnn v4.  If you want earlier versions supported, you can build from sources and set the appropriate library paths / versions during ./configure.
body: Release 0.7.1 wheels now are built assuming cuda-7.5 and cudnn v4.  If you want earlier versions supported, you can build from sources and set the appropriate library paths / versions during ./configure.
